mapper.insert: INSERT INTO medsto_ypcdmlk( idm, gg_idm, lc_idm, yplh, ypmc, ypdm, ypdm1, ypdm2, py, wb, ypgg, jxdm, fldm, zxdw, ggdw, ggxs, cjdm, cjmc, yxq, ykdw, ykxs, jhdw, jhxs, mzdw, mzxs, zydw, zyxs, ylsj, ypfj, mrjj, sxjg, zfbz, zfbl, zyzfbz, gzbz, tsbz, ljlybz, psbz, tybz, qzbz, ybxzbz, ybkzbz, ypkl, zbbz, lrrq, zmlb, ghdw_id, ghdw_mc, yply, pzwh, gmpbz, czyh, czrq, zbdw, mrzbj, zbqh, dffbz, dydm, isdy, memo, babz, qjyybz, otcbz, bxbz, ypsms, govprice, jgyj, cfyp, gfmc, ybmc, gfbz, ybfydj, syfw, syzbz, hybz, yzglbz, sybbz, sgfbz, islcjsyp, lcjsdj, tsypglbz, tsypcgfs, gybz, pzwhxq, tbid, basicdrug_flag, jhsyyp_flag, kjhyp_flag, cfsm, mzbz, sbbxbl, icon, sbjybz, djybz, qtybz, ybbz, kssjb, jsypjb, kzlypbz, dddz, dddzdw, del_flag, create_by, update_date, update_by, remarks, create_date ) VALUES ( #{idm}, #{ggIdm}, #{lcIdm}, #{yplh}, #{ypmc}, #{ypdm}, #{ypdm1}, #{ypdm2}, #{py}, #{wb}, #{ypgg}, #{jxdm}, #{fldm}, #{zxdw}, #{ggdw}, #{ggxs}, #{cjdm}, #{cjmc}, #{yxq}, #{ykdw}, #{ykxs}, #{jhdw}, #{jhxs}, #{mzdw}, #{mzxs}, #{zydw}, #{zyxs}, #{ylsj}, #{ypfj}, #{mrjj}, #{sxjg}, #{zfbz}, #{zfbl}, #{zyzfbz}, #{gzbz}, #{tsbz}, #{ljlybz}, #{psbz}, #{tybz}, #{qzbz}, #{ybxzbz}, #{ybkzbz}, #{ypkl}, #{zbbz}, #{lrrq}, #{zmlb}, #{ghdwId}, #{ghdwMc}, #{yply}, #{pzwh}, #{gmpbz}, #{czyh}, #{czrq}, #{zbdw}, #{mrzbj}, #{zbqh}, #{dffbz}, #{dydm}, #{isdy}, #{memo}, #{babz}, #{qjyybz}, #{otcbz}, #{bxbz}, #{ypsms}, #{govprice}, #{jgyj}, #{cfyp}, #{gfmc}, #{ybmc}, #{gfbz}, #{ybfydj}, #{syfw}, #{syzbz}, #{hybz}, #{yzglbz}, #{sybbz}, #{sgfbz}, #{islcjsyp}, #{lcjsdj}, #{tsypglbz}, #{tsypcgfs}, #{gybz}, #{pzwhxq}, #{tbid}, #{basicdrugFlag}, #{jhsyypFlag}, #{kjhypFlag}, #{cfsm}, #{mzbz}, #{sbbxbl}, #{icon}, #{sbjybz}, #{djybz}, #{qtybz}, #{ybbz}, #{kssjb}, #{jsypjb}, #{kzlypbz}, #{dddz}, #{dddzdw}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{remarks}, #{createDate} )
